subject: âœ… DONE: Chapter Meeting category added to PROD
body:
Cord,

Ran your script on PROD. Category added:

```json
{
  "appId": "2",
  "categoryCode": "CM",
  "categoryName": "Chapter Meeting",
  "categoryNameAbbreviation": "CHMT",
  "_id": "69671c4f0b0868436de49b6b"
}
```

You should now be able to use this category in HarmonyJunction.

- Ben
